articles.title: A sad update on Dolly the dog: MSPCA announces euthanization after medical setback
articles.description:
A 2-year-old pit bull terrier mix had to be euthanized after she was found emaciated in Lexington last week.

The post A sad update on Dolly the dog: MSPCA announces euthanization after medical setback appeared first on Boston.com.

articles.title: Mass. man sentenced to 10 years in state prison for DUI wrong-way crash
articles.description:
Cary Guy of Dighton pleaded no contest to charges of driving the wrong way on I-195 in East Providence while drunk, seriously injuring four people.

The post Mass. man sentenced to 10 years in state prison for DUI wrong-way crash appeared first on Boston.com.
